response.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning for Ontario Region
response.description: Damaging winds and heavy rainfall expected. Seek shelter immediately.
response.instruction: Avoid outdoor activities. Secure loose objects. Monitor local updates.

response.headline: Flood Watch for Eastern Ontario
response.description: Prolonged rainfall may cause localized flooding in low-lying areas.
response.instruction: Prepare for potential evacuations. Avoid driving through flooded roads.
